title: Honey Pot
subtitle: Honey Pot
header: This is a plant-based feminine care e-commerce website.

The Honey Pot is more than just a feminine care company. They are strong advocates for women's health around the world. Each dollar spend with them can impact a greater good. I really lucked out to work on this meaningful project.

content.header: The first complete feminine care system, powered by herbs
paragraphs: In addition to unique and creative products photography, the website also features custom illustrations of different plants to better convey the spirit of 100% natural products and appeal to the customers.

content.header: Set design for promo campaigns is inspired by the Honey Pot productsâ€™ ingredients.
paragraphs: While working on the website design, I paid particular attention to the product details pages aiming at prominently showing the product itself as well as highlighting all the natural components it is made of in a funny and memorable manner.
